frontmatter.description: Psalm 1 is a great passage that shows the difference of a Godly walk vs a non Godly walk
frontmatter.title: The Godly walk

frontmatter.description: Trust is a hard thing to do for some people. When you worry you are not trusting God. God loves you and wants you to trust in him. Will you?
frontmatter.title: Trust God and Don't worry

frontmatter.description: Would you believe me if I told you that happiness is a choice? I strongly believe this is true and here is why
frontmatter.title: Happiness is a Choice
